_comment: Curated models for OpenClaw PM Agent (updated Feb 2026). Latest frontier releases prioritized for reasoning, agents, coding, and PM workflows.

opus-4-6.name: Claude Opus 4.6
opus-4-6.description: Latest flagship - best overall reasoning, agentic tasks, coding/debugging, 1M context beta. Ideal for complex PM planning.

sonnet-4-5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
sonnet-4-5.description: Balanced successor - excellent for most PM/agent tasks, strong reliability and speed trade-off.

haiku-4-5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
haiku-4-5.description: Fast and cheap option in the family - great for quick iterations and lighter PM work.

gpt-5-3-codex.name: GPT-5.3-Codex
gpt-5-3-codex.description: Latest agentic coding/reasoning model (Feb 2026) - fast improvements, tool use, long tasks. Top for PM + dev workflows.

gpt-5-2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt-5-2.description: Strong generalist predecessor - excellent benchmarks, low hallucination, versatile for PM needs.

openrouter/moonshotai/kimi-k2.5.name: Kimi K2.5
openrouter/moonshotai/kimi-k2.5.description: Very fast, low-cost, strong PM/coding/agent performance (MoE + agent swarms).

openrouter/google/gemini-3-flash.name: Gemini 3 Flash
openrouter/google/gemini-3-flash.description: Latest fast variant - frontier speed + intelligence, multimodal, huge context. Great value for PM scale.

openrouter/google/gemini-3-pro.name: Gemini 3 Pro
openrouter/google/gemini-3-pro.description: Top-tier reasoning/context king - often leads real-world PM/coding evals, 1M+ tokens.

openrouter/anthropic/claude-opus-4-6.name: Claude Opus 4.6 (via OpenRouter)
openrouter/anthropic/claude-opus-4-6.description: Access latest Anthropic flagship through OpenRouter for flexibility.
